title: Episode 218. “Our childcare costs are about to quadruple. Are we screwed?” (Part 2)
description: Last week, we met Dominique (33) and Chris (34)—a couple earning $180K a year, raising a toddler, and still living paycheck to paycheck. Dominique felt alone in managing their finances, while Chris stayed disengaged, assuming things were fine. In Part One, we uncovered the cracks: a lack of communication, zero long-term planning, and growing resentment. […] The post Episode 218. “Our childcare costs are about to quadruple. Are we screwed?” (Part 2) first appeared on I Will Teach You To Be Rich. Source
author: Ramit Sethi
